short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Lobstr.io that makes account synchronization secure, fast and effortless.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will enable you to easily retrieve your session cookies when using lobstr.io. In this way, you'll be able to easily synchronize your accounts with lobstr.io and collect the data behind a login seamlessly. 

This extension makes account synchronization simple and effortless.

What's more, sharing session cookies allows us to use your account without you having to share your login details. The confidentiality of your information is precious, and fully guaranteed.

Here's what you can achieve with lobstr.io

* Collect data without writing a line of code
* Enrich this data by connecting effortlessly to our third-party partners
* Automatically export this data in the format of your choice

How does this extension work?

This extension automatically retrieves session cookies from websites to which you are already connected. Once you're in your lobstr.io account, click on 'Yes, I want to synchronize' to have your session cookies retrieved.

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an e-mail at contact@lobstr.io or talk to us directly in the chat room.
